title: quarkus plug caching issue?

labels.name: area/jbang
labels.description: Issues related to when using jbang.dev with Quarkus

body:
### Describe the bug

```
❯ quarkus plug
Listing plguins (default action, see --help).
JBang is needed to list / run jbang plugins, would you like to install it now ? (Y/n) y
    Name 	 Type  	 Scope   	 Location               	 Description
 *  kill 	 jbang 	 project 	 quarkus-kill@quarkusio

❯ quarkus plug remove kill
Removed plugin:
    Name 	 Type  	 Scope   	 Location               	 Description
    kill 	 jbang 	 project 	 quarkus-kill@quarkusio

❯ quarkus kill
Scanning for processes listening on port 8080 ...
No process killed or not found any process on port 8080
If looking for a different port use --port <port>
```

why can I un kill when I just removed it?

```
❯ quarkus plug list
    Name 	 Type  	 Scope 	 Location               	 Description
 *  kill 	 jbang 	 user  	 quarkus-kill@quarkusio

❯ quarkus plug remove kill
Removed plugin:
    Name 	 Type  	 Scope 	 Location               	 Description
    kill 	 jbang 	 user  	 quarkus-kill@quarkusio

❯ quarkus plug list
No plugins installed!
To include the installable plugins in the list, append --installable to the command.
❯ quarkus kill
Command kill is not installed, but a matching plugin is available. Would you like to install it now ? (Y/n)
```

one second call its removed. calling kill now ask for install.
